description:
Yamamoto`s voice reaches Tsuna`s transmitter and the Vongola base! It is only for an instant, but they hear that he is in battle. Tsuna is worried, but he cannot hear his voice anymore. Meanwhile, Yamamoto is focused on his battle with the Phantom Knight. He showers him with Shigure Soen Ryu techniques, but the Phantom Knight dodges them all without even flinching. The Phantom Knight attacks while making use of illusions! Yamamoto manages to block the Phantom Knight`s sword with his Shigure Kintoki, but it gets a crack in its blade! Yamamoto is shocked--!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La leçon de l`Empereur de l`épée
